cast.name: 阿贝尔·费拉拉 Abel Ferrara

awards:
第70届戛纳电影节(2017)
　　导演双周单元(提名) 阿贝尔·费拉拉

director.name: 阿贝尔·费拉拉 Abel Ferrara

introduction: Abel Ferrara headlines a film retrospective and a series of concerts in France dedicated to songs and music from his films. Preparations with his family and friends will form the material of this self portrait, showing another side of the director of legendary films Bad Lieutenant, The King of New York and The Addiction. Ferrara is joined on stage by past collaborators, including composer Joe Delia, actor-singer Paul Hipp and his wife, actress Cristina Chiriac for concerts at the Metronum in Toulouse and the Salò Club in Paris in October 2016.   QUINZAINE DES RÉALISATEURS 2017
